www.appcraver.com (9/10!):
Super Juicy is bringing a new kind of action to the popular genre started by Bejeweled. The point is still to match like objects, but instead of jewels or parrots Super Juicy is all about the bubbles, baby. Moving bubbles that float, squeeze and grow in an ever-changing dance that kept me engaged for all 38 levels.

www.pocketfullofapps.com (OVERALL 10/10!) :
The graphics are fun, and great for all ages. Sound is equally well done, and this game will keep you playing for a long time.

Description
---------
5 Game Modes! Bluetooth and Wifi Multiplayer! 39 Levels! Online leaderboards! In-Game Achievements!

Super Juicy is non-stop bubble popping fun for the whole family! Earn points by popping groups of three or more matching bubbles. Tap bonus items for more points. Avoid hazards such as spikes and unbreakable bubbles. Use special powers such as bombs and black holes!

Super Juicy has:
- Silky smooth, realistic physics
- 36 unique levels
- Many bonus levels
- Auto-save feature in case your game is interrupted
- High score list to record your best games
- Juiciest game on iPhone!

Super Juicy is expected to be 100% BUG-FREE! If you encounter a bug, please help me out by contacting me at dev@berzerkergames.com.
